definitions.meaning:
([transitive ,  intransitive ] reconsider(sth) | reconsider what, how, etc…)
to think about sth again, especially because you might want to change a previous decision or opinion 
重新考虑；重新审议

examples.content:
to reconsider your decision/position 
重新考虑你的决定╱立场

Recent information may persuade the board to reconsider. 
最近得到的信息也许会使董事会重新考虑。

This has forced the United States to seriously reconsider its position...
这迫使美国重新认真考虑自己的立场
